DrugInfoMetaData.DrugInfoDescription: Lapatinib ditosylate works by blocking the activity of HER2, a protein found in high levels on some cancer cells and causes them to grow. This may slow or stop the growth of cells that have a lot of HER2. Lapatinib ditosylate is a type of targeted therapy drug called a kinase inhibitor. It is a small-molecule drug (a drug that can enter cells easily).

Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Lapatinib ditosylate is approved to be used with other drugs to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Breast cancer that is advanced or has metastasized (spread to other parts of the body). Section.Para: Lapatinib ditosylate is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
